file_content.text: This datacron is no longer active.
You've located a datacron, an ancient technology once used by the Infinite Empire that can improve your natural attributes.
Some datacrons were created for a singular purpose; this one can improve the Endurance Attribute.
The datacron is still active; use it to improve your Endurance Attribute. Once used, its power can no longer be accessed.
You can feel the increased power coursing through your body; perhaps there are more to be found.
